headline: Apollo Global’s (APO) Funds to Acquire Major U.S. Hydropower Platform; BMO Starts Coverage at “Market Perform”
summary: Third Point Management holds $180,884,250 worth of Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) shares, representing 2.37% of its portfolio. The stock is included in our list of Billionaire Dan Loeb’s 10 Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. Apollo Global Management Inc. (NYSE:APO) announced on October 6, 2025, that its managed funds have agreed to acquire one of the […]
